title: Ticket #6667: D_ONT_BE_RUDE
description: Add a new debug flag, D_ONT_BE_RUDE. Setting this debug flag ensures that the HTCondor daemon(s) never just hang up, and always (try to) say goodbye first. Useful for determining which broken connections were intentional and for placating Aunt Edna.
remarks:
2018-Apr-27 13:25:49 by johnkn:
perhaps D_NO_HANGUPS would be better?

2018-Apr-27 13:32:43 by tlmiller:
No, Aunt Edna has a lot of hang-ups, at least according to Uncle Joe.
